name: False Age
text: Half-elves are accustomed to aging at a different rate from those close to them and can temporarily present themselves at a different age. Select an age category within one step of your actual age category, either older or younger. Your appearance changes to match your age for the chosen category. Your ability scores increase or decrease as appropriate for your chosen age category.
components_zh: 言语，姿势，材料（细滑石粉）
text_zh: 半精灵习惯于以与他们身边的人不同的速度衰老，并且可以暂时以不同的年龄出现。选择一个与你的实际年龄层相差不超过一个阶段的年龄层，无论是更年长还是更年幼。你的外表会发生变化，以符合你选择的年龄层。你的属性值会根据你所选择的年龄层增加或减少。
